summary:
"Hi, my name is Julian"
First sketch of my modern/retailer AU for The Arcana, 'Little Shop of Hexes' 
Long goth boi, too much...
body:
“Hi, my name is Julian”

First sketch of my modern/retailer AU for The Arcana, ‘Little Shop of Hexes’

Long goth boi, too much caffeine, dont bother him with obv questions and dont use a bunch of little coins or he’ll hate you forever.

Enjoy + thanks...
⇒far-eviler|bhanesidhe|oh-shush↵

summary: Hi I just saw your posts about not being credited for the runes on Shadowhunters and while that is really awful and they for...
question: Hi I just saw your posts about not being credited for the runes on Shadowhunters and while that is really awful and they for sure should have asked you for help when they started making up runes for the show, some of the things said were really hurtful and upsetting as a fan of the show and the cast. Most of the fandom would be upset too if they knew about this, we could have tried to help you get the recognition you deserve. Freeform is the enemy here the show and cast don't deserve hate.
answer:
The studios behavioral choices toward myself and co. ranged from unprofessional to vile. Attempts to handle things discreetly were met with callousness. Their mishandling of many, many things led to the shows laughably inevitable downfall (much to my relief). I wish I felt as though fans would have had my back, in all honesty I felt they were so hyped for the TV Series content they were blind to my hardship and various other failings. I don’t know if I had a chance to do things differently, I doubt I’d have bitched about it publicly… I doubt it would have made a difference. Frankly I feel nothing would have saved the show from the get-go, but my edge of insight is different. Skewed certainly.

I’ve said not one negative word against the cast or crew who I’ve had no personal contact with and have only had negative things to say toward the dark corners of the fandom that followed in Freeforms’ suit and manipulated my runes toward their personal benefit. With such a MASSIVE example put forth I can’t say that I’m surprised but I can say that I’m hella disappointed.

Moving forward past the show and onto newer works (especially with my friends), having made officially new runes©🖤,helping with new books and being in talks with new and constant fans is my reward in the end! That cannot be taken away from me. Thank you for giving 2 shits about 👉🏽this here dumbshit.

⚜️Your, Val xx⚜️
